item.title: Quickly Setup Samba on FreeBSD 13
item.description: Some notes how I’ve quickly set up Samba share for my macOS machines in the local network. Installation Link to heading # pkg install samba413 Samba Configuration Link to heading # vim /usr/local/etc/smb4.conf [global] workgroup = WORKGROUP server string = FreeBSD Server Samba netbios name = freebsd-desktop wins support = yes security = user passdb backend = tdbsam [archive] path = /backuppool/archive valid users = gogo public = no writable = yes browsable = yes read only = no guest ok = no create mask = 0755 directory mask = 0755 pdbedit -a -u gogo new password: retype new password: Enable Samba Server Link to heading sysrc samba_server_enable="YES" service samba_server start

item.title: My Freebsd 13 Setup
